section.title: Time Clock Summary

note.para: This function is only available if Time & Attendance is set to be recorded by Employee. This setting can be found under Manufacturing > Setup > Configure > Manufacture.

section.para: To view a summary of Time Clock information related to Employees, select the "Time Clock Summary" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Production Time Clock by Work Order

tip.para: Click the MORE button to display more filtering options.

section.para: When viewing Time Clock information related to Employees, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Time Clock entries posted on and after this date will be displayed.
Time Clock entries posted on and before this date will be displayed.
Display lists time entries according to the selected dates for Employees who have clocked-in and clocked-out using the Time Clock.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

listitem.para: All the time for the selected Employee will be posted. Time not associated with a Work Order will be posted to the labor overhead account.
All unposted time displayed will be posted.
You can edit unposted time for an Employee. The following screen will appear when you click the EDIT button when a specific time entry is selected:

tip.para: To reverse time, highlight the entry you wish to reverse and click the REVERSE button.

listitem.para: Displays the type of labor. Time not associated with a Work Order is considered overhead.
Enables you to change the start date and/or time of the time entry for the selected Employee.
Enables you to change the end date and/or time of the time entry for the selected Employee.
Displays the number of hours that have been calculated previously.
Displays the number of hours that have been calculated after the specified time in the Shift.
